subject: Update downstream code nodes to use subworkflow response instead of $vars
description: Replace $vars.ST_TENANT_ID, $vars.ST_APP_KEY, and static data token reads with references to the auth subworkflow response data.

metadata.evidence: All code nodes updated via n8n_update_partial_workflow: prepare_query, get_tomorrow_appointments/get_completed_jobs, format_appointment_list/format_job_list, get_customer_details in both knB3ZyreIIQwZh9k and 07ki4WkQol61XZPQ. All now read from $('get_auth_config') instead of $vars/$getWorkflowStaticData
